medical_history.chief_complaint: Painful mass in the left inguinoscrotal region.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: A 1-month history of painful swelling of the left testis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: At 13 years old, patient had a dog bite to the scrotum and left thigh. Presented with gynecomastia 4 years later.
medical_history.family_history: Patient has 2 sisters with no apparent genital abnormalities.
medical_history.social_history: Unemployed laborer, reared as a male subject, with a reduced potency.
